title: 1vX
rules: Only one player is active at a time.
Inactive players are not allowed to move, shoot, use cams etc.

rules.text: Inactive players wait their turn outside.
Inactive players are allowed to "Hero Drone", but not drone ahead of the active player.
Inactive players will find a hiding spot and wait their turn there.

title: Advent Calendar
rules: Everyone picks a window or door and spawnpeeks.

title: Age Limit
tagline: Let me see your identification, please!
rules: Let the randomizer pick an operator.
You can only pick operators which were released before (or at the same time as) that operator.

title: Alternate Arms
rules: Pick a random operator.
Equip a different main gun.
Equip a different secondary gun.
Equip a different secondary gadget.

title: Arnold Cut
rules: Everyone has to speak like Arnold Schwarzenegger.

title: A Song of Ice and Fire
rules: Kill enemies that are frozen by Tubar√£o with fire.

title: A Throwaway Joke
rules: Bring as many throwable primary and secondary gadgets as possible.
Shout "YEET" every time you throw one.

title: Back on the Sticks
rules: You must use a controller to play.

title: Biene Maja
rules: Only bring operators with yellow icons.
Everyone follows Grim's lead.
Sing "Biene Maja" for the duration of the round.

title: Big Brother
rules: Remaining operator brings a bulletproof camera.
Place all your cameras on site.
Hide on the other side of the building and watch the enemy on cams.
Red ping the enemy all the time.
You may retake site as soon as the defuser is planted or the hostage or site is being taken.

title: Blackout
rules: Don't bring any electric gadgets.

rules.text: Keep your drones at spawn and immediately shoot them when the action phase starts.
As soon as you see anything electrical, shoot or EMP it and say "Focking laser sights."
Shoot all default cameras during prep phase.

title: Boomstick
tagline: A deadly squad. Unless they're more than 5 meters away.
rules: Only use shotguns.
If possible, bring secondary shotguns as well.

title: Bravo Six, going dark!
tagline: Hope you brought night vision goggles.
rules: Set your in-game brightness to 10.

title: C5
tagline: Can you die from explosions? You'll have to C4 yourself.
rules: Try to kill all attackers with C4s from below site.
You are only allowed to start shooting at people when all C4s are used up.

title: Counter Strike
rules: Hipfire only. There is no ADS button.

title: Da Vinci Cannon
tagline: You don't need good aim if you shoot everywhere at once.
rules: Set your in-game mouse sensitivity to 100 and your mouse DPI to the maximum.
Bring only LMGs.
Shoot entire magazines at a time.

title: Doktor's Curse
rules: No guns allowed.
Make your traps and knives count.

title: Drone Strike
tagline: "Why do it yourself, when robots do it better?" - Echo
rules: Bring all of the drones.
You are only allowed to attack with your operators when all drones (normal drones or gadgets) are dead.
If they have Echo or Mozzie, don't destroy their drones.

title: East Take
rules: Take site from the east side.

title: Feel the Burn
rules: After every kill, do 3 push-ups.
When you die, do 10 push-ups.

title: G2 vs TT9
tagline: "They can only drone us if we move!" -Alemao, probably
rules: Don't move during preparation phase. No walking, no turning, no reinforcing, no shooting drones.

title: Grounded
rules: You are not allowed to rappel, vault or climb ladders.

title: Hot Breach
tagline: E3 2014 called. It wants its Siege trailer back.
rules: Everyone brings breach charges.
Everyone picks a window and hot-breaches into the building at the same time.

title: Hot Drop Retake
rules: Wait on a hatch above site until the objective is being taken or defused.
As soon as the objective is being taken or defused, hot-drop the hatch and retake site.

title: Hurr!
rules: You may only communicate with Minecraft villager noises.

title: Iron Sights only
tagline: What do you mean you can't see?
rules: Unequip any sights on your guns.

title: King's Guard

rules.text: Survive.

rules: Protect Tachanka at all costs.
As the leader of the Secret Service, everyone follows Warden's orders.
If Tachanka dies, the rest commits sudoku or surrenders themselves to the enemy.

title: Labyrinth
rules: Treat the map "as-is". You are not allowed to create any additional pathways, sightlines etc.
You are allowed to use pathways created by the other team.

rules.text: You are allowed to destroy barricades, but no walls or hatches.
You are not allowed to barricade any windows or doors. Leave the natural pathways open.
You are allowed to reinforce walls and hatches, but not destroy them.

title: Leaky Roof
rules: Bring as much soft destruction as you can.
Destroy every desctructible floor above site.

title: Lucky Luke
rules: Only use revolvers.

title: Might need this later
tagline: When did I get 250 health potions?
rules: Bring a lot of depletable utility.
Don't utilize it.

title: No backing off!
rules: As soon as Action Phase starts, you hold W.
Don't let go of W until you win or die.

title: One in the Chamber
rules: You may only shoot at enemies with one bullet in the chamber.
Use reload cancel to empty your magazines.
Shotguns are disallowed.

title: One in the Chamber (extreme)
rules: You may only shoot at enemies with one bullet in the chamber.
Use reload cancel to empty your magazines.
You may only bring LMGs.
Secondary guns are disallowed.

title: Pacifist
tagline: No defenders were hurt during the production of this round.
rules: Win the round without hurting any enemies.
Don't bring any lethal gadgets.
Non-lethal gadgets are allowed (Airjab, EMP, Candela, Stun Grenades etc).

title: Parkour
rules: You are not allowed to take stairs.
You can only change floors by rappelling or hatch dropping.

rules.text: Make sure to bring your shield.
Immediately attach your shields when you don't have one on your gun.
If you run out of shields, you have to play behind one of your teammates.
When moving you must hold a shield in front of your face.
To shoot, you must place your shield down first and shoot from behind it.
If you run out of shields, you have to play behind one of your teammates.

title: Pistol Round
rules: You are only allowed to use semi-automatic pistols.

rules.text: Don't bring any shields.

title: Pok√©mon
rules: Only kill enemies with impact grenades.
You are allowed to soften them up with your pistol.

title: Polyglot
rules: No two players may speak the same language.

title: Privacy, Please!

rules.text: Use your jammers to prevent drones from entering.
Use your pests to prevent drones from entering. Shoot them as soon as you capture them.

rules: Reinforce every outside wall of site.
Reinforce every door and window you pass.
Don't create sightlines.
Deploy observation blockers everywhere.
Shoot every default camera.
Don't bring cameras.

title: Red Light, Green Light
tagline: Really takes the "and" out of "Run and Gun".
rules: You may not shoot and move at the same time.

title: Rooted
rules: Pick your spot. As soon as Action Phase starts, you are not allowed to move away.

title: Rush B
rules: Rush B

title: Santa Claus

rules.text: Place your Armor Plates outside the building for the attackers to take.
Place your Kona Stations outside the building for the attackers to use.

rules: Let the attackers use the gifts unhindered. No camping the presents.

title: Slow and Steady
rules: You can only move by Alt-walking.

title: Sniper Squad
rules: Bring DMRs with 3x scopes.
Only use primary guns.

title: The Hunt
tagline: "A hunter always watches where he steps." - Kapkan
rules: Place your traps, then hide closeby.
Don't take engagements directly. Play off your traps.
Bonus: Only get kills with your traps or knives.

title: The Solo Queue Experience‚Ñ¢
rules: No communication allowed. Mute yourself in-game and in Discord / TeamSpeak.
Write toxic messages to your teammates in team chat.

title: Speedrun
rules: Bring only 3 speed operators.
Take the most direct route to site.
No roam clearing.

title: Spinbot
tagline: We don't have better aim, we have MORE aim!
rules: Set your in-game mouse sensitivity to 100 and your mouse DPI to the maximum.

title: Splinter Cell
rules: Only use silenced handguns.
Machine pistols, secondary shotguns, Deagle, revolvers and GONNE-6 are disallowed.

rules.text: Everyone follows Zero's lead.
Everyone follows Caveira's lead.
Track them.
Call them.
Scan them.
Bee them.
Hunt them.

title: Supressive Fire
tagline: LMG mounted. And loaded. And unloaded. On everything.
rules: Bring only LMGs.
As soon as you start shooting, you cannot stop until your magazine is empty.

title: Swiss Cheese
rules: Make as many punch holes in reinforcable walls as possible.
Only shoot at people through punch holes.

title: Switcheroo
tagline: The room is safe! What do you mean they planted?
rules: Completely reinforce a different site on the map.
The switched site can't share a room with the actual site (e.g. Kitchen / Dining and Kitchen / Meeting on Oregon).

title: The Floor is Lava
rules: As soon as Action Phase starts, you may only shoot from elevated positions.
You may only touch the lava to sprint directly to a new high ground.

title: The Snake
rules: Inside the building, you are only allowed to move while prone.
You may stand up to shoot, but need to go prone again to continue moving.

title: The Wimba Way
tagline: Singing "In the Jungle" is always just a whim away.
rules: Sing "In the Jungle" during the entire round.

title: Thin Air

rules.text: Roofs are off-limits.

rules: You are only allowed to prone on the top floor.
You are only allowed to crouch and prone on the second highest floor.
Any stance is allowed on lower floors.

title: Welcome!
rules: You may not reinforce any walls or barricade any doors.
Fully open every reinforcable wall on and between sites.

rules.text: Place Welcome Mats at as many entry points into site as possible.

title: Wet Work
rules: You are only allowed to enter and exit the building through bathrooms.

title: Year 1 Turtle
tagline: Site is Home. Site is Safe Space.
rules: Bring only Pathfinder operators.
Reinforce every wall, door and window of site.
Sit in site for the entire round.
Pray they don't bring Fuze.
